japanese: はあ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese:
（なんで俺がモデルなんて……
　親父はマジで何を考えてるんだ）
translation:
(Why do I have to be the model...
 what in the hell is Dad thinking?)

japanese:
（まさか、島に行く前に言ってた『バイト』が
　写真のモデル、しかも結婚式場のＰＲ用写真の
　新郎役だとは……）
translation:
(Unbelievable. The 'part-time job' he mentioned before 
 we went to the island was about working as a groom 
 model for a wedding ceremony hall's PR photoshoot...)

japanese: （報酬がよくなけりゃ、全力で断ってるところだ）
translation:
(If the pay wasn't good,
 I would've totally refused it.)

japanese:
（新婦役のモデルはここに来るらしいが、
　なんで俺が出迎えまでやらされてるんだ？）
translation:
(I heard that the bride model is coming here soon,
 but why am I the one to pick her up?)

japanese:
（それに、相手は見ればわかるって
　そんなのあるわけ……）
translation:
(And, that I'll understand when I see who the model is.
 What does that even mean...)

japanese: おはよう、フー君。
translation: Good morning, Fu-kun.

japanese:
あ、二乃？
偶然だな、どこかに行くのか？
translation:
Ah, Nino?
What a coincidence, were you heading somewhere?

japanese:
偶然じゃないわ。
私はここで待ち合わせなんだから。
translation:
It's not a coincidence.
I'm the one you're supposed to meet here.
...HUH?

japanese:
結婚式場のＰＲ写真のバイト。
フー君が撮影場所まで連れて行ってくれるのよね？
translation:
For the part-time job
at the wedding ceremony hall PR photoshoot.
You'll take me to the shooting location, right?

japanese: はああああっ！？
translation: WHAAAAA?!

japanese:
ほら、早く行きましょ。
バイトなのに遅刻したら怒られちゃうわ。
translation:
Come on, let's get going.
Even though it's a part-time job,
we'll get scolded if we're late.

japanese:
（あ、あのクソ親父！
　相手が二乃だと正直に言ったら俺が断ると思って
　ハメやがったな！？）
translation:
(Th-that damn old man of mine!
 He trapped me, knowing that I would've declined if
 I'd known my partner was going to be Nino?!)

japanese:
モデルのお仕事なんて初めてよ。
どんな感じか楽しみだわ。
translation:
This is my first time working as a model.
I'm excited to see what it's like.

japanese:
お、おい待て、二乃。
本当にやるのか？
その、新郎新婦役だぞ……？
translation:
H-hey, wait, Nino.
Do you really want to do this?
I mean, being my bride in a photoshoot?

japanese: フー君は嫌なの？
translation: You don't want to do it, Fu-kun?

japanese:
い、嫌というわけではないが！
だが、その、こんなところでウェディングドレスを
着てしまっていいのかと……。
translation:
I-I didn't say that!
But, um, I wonder if it's okay
to wear a wedding dress in a place like this...

japanese:
いいから引き受けたの。
だって、相手はフー君なんだもの。
translation:
It's fine. I accepted the job, you know.
I mean, my partner would be you, Fu-kun.

japanese:
それに、当日になってやっぱり嫌です、
なんて無責任よ。
ほら、行きましょ。
translation:
Besides, we can't just run away from our work!
That'd be very irresponsible, you dork.
Come on, let's go.

japanese: お、おう……。
translation: Y-yeah...

japanese:
ねえねえ、フー君。
このドレス、素敵なデザインだと思わない？
translation:
Hey, hey, Fu-kun.
Don't you think this dress is gorgeous?

japanese:
私の好きなアパレルブランドの
ウェディングラインより清楚な感じだけど――
translation:
It's a little more tidy than the wedding dresses
of my favourite apparel brand, but%p-2;――

japanese:
ほら！
動きが可愛く見えるように工夫されてるのよ。
translation:
See! They designed it in a way that my movement 
looks cute.

japanese: へえ、そういうもんか。
translation: Wow, that's how it is, eh.

japanese:
反応薄いわね。
もうちょっと気の利いた感想はないのかしら？
translation:
That's all you have to say. Seriously?
Can't you make a more intelligent statement?

japanese:
……女子の服なんてよくわからん。
気に入ったならなによりだ。
translation:
...I don't get women's clothing.
If you like it, good for you.

japanese:
あっそう。
もう、フー君はフー君ね。
せめて、似合うとか言ったら？
translation:
Really, now.
Oh, Fu-kun, you are just such a DORK.
Would you at least tell me if it looks good on me?

japanese: あ、ああ、似合っているとは思うが。
translation: Y-yeah, I think it looks good on you.

japanese: 本当に？
translation: Really?

japanese: 本当だ。
translation: Really.

japanese:
……悪いが、俺はこういうときに
気の利いたことを言えるようなタイプじゃ
ないんだよ。
translation:
Sorry, but I don't think I'm the kind of guy
who could say something intelligent about clothing.

japanese:
ふふっ、仕方ないわね。
今日はこのくらいで勘弁してあげる。
translation:
Teehee, it can't be helped, huh.
I'll let you off the hook for today.

japanese:
結婚式場の写真撮影、としか聞いてなかったから
どんなものなのかなって思ってたけど……。
translation:
I heard it's a wedding photoshoot,
so I was wondering what it would be like...

japanese:
こんなに素敵なドレスを着せてもらえるなんて。
ふふっ！　いいわね、モデルの仕事も。
translation:
I didn't expect to wear such a nice dress.
Teehee! Modeling jobs are fun too.

japanese:
でも、次にウェディングドレスを着るときは
本番かしらね。
translation:
But, the next time I wear a wedding dress,
I want it to be the real deal.

japanese: まあ、そう何度も着るものじゃないよな。
translation:
Well, it's not something
you'll wear over and over again.

japanese: フー君だって人ごとじゃないわよ？
translation: You're more of an accessory, right, Fu-kun?

japanese:
結婚式って、新郎は添え物みたいなもんだろ？
主役はどう考えても新婦だし。
translation:
Yeah, the groom is kind of an accessory for the bride, 
huh? The main character is the bride,
no matter how you put it.

japanese: ……そういう意味じゃないわよ。
translation: ...That's not what I mean.

japanese:
まあ、添え物は言いすぎかもしれないが、
やっぱり新婦の幸せそうな姿が
式の一番の見所だろうしな。
translation:
Well, maybe calling the groom an accessory 
is maybe misleading, but the bride's happiness
is probably the highlight of the ceremony.

japanese:
そうね。
結婚式って、新婦にとっては一生で一度、
世界の唯一の主役、お姫様になれる日だもの。
translation:
That's true.
A wedding is a once-in-a-lifetime event for a woman
to feel like a princess.

japanese:
けれど、そのとき、私をお姫様にしてくれるのは……
世界でたった１人の王子様よ。
translation:
However, 
the person who will make me a princess...
will be my prince, he'll be the only one for me.

japanese: 王子様がいなければ、私はお姫様になれない。
translation:
Without a prince,
I can't become a princess.

japanese:
ねえ、フー君。
私がお姫様になる日は、
そう遠い未来じゃないと思うの。
translation:
Hey, Fu-kun.
I think the day I'll become a princess
isn't so far away.

japanese: いつか迎えるその日のために――
translation: In order for that special day%p-2;――

japanese:
私は、私にできることを
１つ１つ積み重ねていくわ。
私らしく、私なりに、しっかりと歩んでいくの。
translation:
I'm going to build up everything, one by one,
and proceed at my own pace.

japanese:
王子様が私を求めてくれるように。
そして、求められたとき、
自信をもって応えられるように。
translation:
So, that the prince will desire me.
And, when he asks for my hand, I'll find the confidence
to respond.

japanese: ……お前なら、どんな王子様にだって応えられるさ。
translation: ...I wonder what kind of prince you'd prefer?

japanese:
そうかしら？
今の私はまだまだよ。
translation:
I wonder?
I still have a long way to go.

japanese:
だって、たった１人を
振り向かせることもできないんだもの。
translation:
Like, I can't even make a single person
take an interest in me.

japanese: 俺も、いろいろとやらなきゃな。
translation: I've got to get a few things done, myself.

japanese: フー君も？
translation: You too, Fu-kun?

japanese:
勉強さえできれば、何か成せると思ってた。
だけど、世の中そう簡単にいくもんじゃない。
translation:
I thought I could do anything I want, if I just study hard
enough, but the world doesn't work that way.

japanese:
そう気づかせてくれたのは、お前たちだ。
ありがとな。
translation:
You guys are the ones that made me realize that.
Thanks.

japanese: うん……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese: そして……。
translation: And...

japanese:
（このまま、曖昧にはしておけない。
　二乃はここまで真剣なんだ。
　俺も……答えを見つけなくてはならない）
translation:
(I can't leave things as vague as they are.
 Nino is so serious.
 Me too... I have to find the answer.)

japanese: ねえ、フー君。
translation: Hey, Fu-kun.

japanese: なんだ？
translation: What?

japanese:
もし、王子様が私を選んでくれなくても
簡単に諦めたりしないわよ？
translation:
Even if the prince doesn't choose me,
I won't give up so easily, you know?
Wha...

japanese:
お姫様だからって、大人しく座って
キスを待っているようなのは性に合わないもの。
translation:
Just because I'm a princess,
I don't have to wait for a kiss.

japanese: いっそのこと、王子様にキスしちゃおうかしら。
translation: Better yet, maybe I'll kiss the prince.

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese: （キスって……あの春休みの……？）
translation: (A kiss... Is she talking about the spring break thingy?)

japanese:
なーんてね。
私を、ただの可愛いお姫様だって侮っちゃダメよ？
translation:
Just kidding.
Don't look down on me,
just because I'm a pretty perfect princess, okay?

japanese: ……ああ、肝に銘じておく。
translation: ...Yeah, I'll keep that in mind.

japanese: （まさか、な……）
translation: (To think she might've...)
